## R Markdown


```{r cars}
otutable <- read.delim('otutable.txt',header = TRUE, check.names = FALSE)

metadata <- read.table('samples',check.names = FALSE)
unifrac <- read.table('OTUS.unweighted_unifrac.txt')
wunifrac <- read.table('OTUS.weighted_unifrac.txt')
```

```{r}
data <- amp_load(otutable = otutable, metadata = metadata)
data$abund <- unifrac
NMDS <- amp_ordinate(data, type = 'NMDS', distmeasure = 'none',
                      detailed_output = TRUE, transform = 'none',
                       k = 10, try = 20, trymax = 50,
                      species_plot = TRUE, filter_species = 0)
NMDS$plot
m <- data$abund
data$abund <- wunifrac
NMDS <- amp_ordinate(data, type = 'NMDS', distmeasure = 'none',
                      detailed_output = TRUE, transform = 'none',
                       k = 10, try = 20, trymax = 50,
                      filter_species = 0)
NMDS$plot
k <- data$abund
m == k
```
